overview: Former lovers Olivia and Hector meet at a bar after 30 years. They discuss memories of being stranded on an island while exiling to the States, on a raft, from Cuba. As they argue over the truth of events leading to a horrific act of survival, we flashback to the island in a Rashomon-style debate.
tagline: Can Love Survive on a Desert Island?
title: Love & Hunger
